author: morciuch
msg: Applied patch by Jeremy Ford to fix paging issues in admin browsers (see Bugzilla bug# 19124).
Also, made look and feel of all browser more consistent and readable. Used the security browsers as the standard (it's not a very sophisticated look but works for now).
